content: As an AI language model, I can provide you with some ideas, but I don't have access to real-time pricing data. There are many affordable leisure options in Santa Monica, such as visiting the Santa Monica Pier, which is completely free, and offers an array of activities, including fishing, amusement park rides, and live music performances. The beach is also a great spot for free or low-cost activities, such as sunbathing, swimming, or playing beach volleyball. Additionally, there are many free public parks and outdoor recreational areas throughout Santa Monica, including the Tongva Park, which offers beautiful views of the ocean and a playground for children of all ages. Overall, while Santa Monica may have higher average prices for entertainment and leisure activities in comparison to other California cities, there are still plenty of affordable options to enjoy.
